mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stories From Home
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for Stories From Home. A blend of stories, music, dance and audience participation with Anndrena Belcher. Anndrena Belcher weaves entertaining tales from the Old World, the Appalachian Mountains, and contemporary times. Giving life to mountain history...Anndrena connects the joys and sorrows of the past to modern day situations. She presents a fast moving program that sparkles with her style of expression and sense of humor.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. Theatre Arts - University Theatre
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
